howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to issue verified digital certificates at scale
howItWorks.step1Desc: Customize templates with your brand colors, logo, and layout. Create stunning certificates in minutes.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: A complete platform for issuing, managing, and verifying digital credentials
features.blockchainDesc: Every certificate is anchored to the blockchain, making it tamper-proof and independently verifiable by anyone.
features.brandingDesc: White-label the entire experience. Your logo, colors, and domain on every certificate and wallet.
features.bulkDesc: Issue thousands of certificates at once via CSV upload. Automate with our API for seamless workflows.
features.apiDesc: RESTful API with webhooks. Integrate certificate issuance directly into your LMS or platform.
features.analyticsDesc: Track views, shares, and verifications. Understand how your certificates are being used.
features.multilangDesc: Issue certificates in any language. Support for RTL scripts and Unicode characters.
